biocontainers.name: rop
biocontainers.summary: The Read Origin Protocol (ROP) is a computational protocol that aims to discover the source of all reads, including those originating from repeat sequences, recombinant B and T cell receptors, and microbial communities.

biotools.summary: Discovering the source of all reads originating from complex RNA molecules.

bioschemas.name: ROP
bioschemas.summary: Discovering the source of all reads originating from complex RNA molecules.
